overview: Sinner City a Domini Quinn SupaStar jawn Jade Banks is at the top of her game in corporate America as C.F.O of a credit card company called Viva Express. In this satirical thriller, when Jade is unfairly passed over for a well deserved promotion, she decides to tank the company with a well devised scam called the double up. Welcome to Sinner City...
title: Sinner City
